promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a young special gecko fire-type pokemon holding a fiery mace. It can be found in desert-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fire or gecko. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Blazemace, a a young special gecko fire-type pokemon. It can be found in desert-like environments It has the following abilities: Heat Tackle. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "gecko", "fire" or "Blazemace". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fire-type pokemon, gecko-like, special, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, lava texture background
generatedDescription: Scorching imprints mark its path through the sandy terrains. With a body that burns like a furnace, it bats away foes with heated strikes.
